name: Moonlight Crossing
summary: Pleione is a Faerie that lives in the forest with her sisters, but she's always pined for the heavens and the stars above, and she's even managed to start trading letters with a Moon Faerie. When a human spaceship crashes in her forest, she starts wondering that if humans can get to the Moon, why can't she? And so she tries to fix the ship...
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Visual Novel
  • 发行日期: 2017-04-03
  • 官方网站: https://aoriradidjiu.itch.io/moonlight-crossing
